General.Name: Shanghai Xinpeng Industry Co Ltd
General.Description: Shanghai Xinpeng Industry Co.,Ltd. develops, manufactures, and sells metal electromechanical parts in China and internationally. The company designs and manufactures various kinds of tooling and metal parts through stamping and sheet metal processes. Its products include moulds, motors, stampings, auto parts, and plasma base plates, as well as OEM and CNC products. The company serves multinational corporations. Shanghai Xinpeng Industry Co.,Ltd. was founded in 1997 and is based in Shanghai, China.
